name: Big Radio Online
description: Suno Sunao, Life Banao!92.7 BIG FM, India’s No. 1 FM Station, since the launch of its first Station in September 2006, has expanded at a phenomenal pace, creating history, by launching its 45 station network in record breaking time of 18 months (barring Shimla which launched in 2009). With a presence spanning across 45 cities, 1200 towns and 52,000 villages reaching more than 200 million Indians across India, the brand is now looking towards expanding to more markets and geographies.

name: Radio Madhuban
description: Radio Madhuban 90.4 FM is a broadcast Radio station from Abu Road, India, emphasis is on the developmental, agricultural, educational, environmental development, health, social welfare, community and cultural development of their listeners. And the station also encourages traditional value building within their society. The programming reflects the special interests and needs of the local community and its residents.

name: Gurgaon Ki Awaaz
description: Gurgaon Ki Awaaz Samudayik Radio reaches over 500,000 listeners via its low power FM broadcast on 107.8 FM in Gurgaon, and across the world through its internet streaming broadcast. On air since 2009, the radio station broadcasts 22 hours a day, a mix of folk music from a range of languages of north India, and talk radio with interactive telephony. Broadcast shuts from 2-4 pm every day. Issues discussed range from health, livelihood, legal literacy, women's rights, adolescence, local governance, and much more.

name: Radio Islam

The channel is a 24-hour internet radio channel, which represents a mosaic of Hindustani and Carnatic classical music through DTH facility.
